description:
While he`s fighting Aldebaran, Seiya tells his friends they should advance through to the next house and begin fighting there. But Aldebaran stops them in their tracks and knocks them unconscious with his incredible "Great Hom" powers. He then turns his attack on Seiya and beats him to deaths door, but Seiya refuses to give up. With spiritual inspiration and guidance from his sister, Marin, and his wounded friend Saari, Seiya uncovers what Moo meant about the seventh-sense power. During a long and difficult battle with Aldebaran, Seiya acquires his seventh sense power and the tables are then quickly turned. Seiya attacks Aldebaran with his mighty Pegasus meteor "Big Bang" power, leaving Alderbaran …
Source: crunchyroll
